item.description:
Net Net, we leave bright and early, nap on the way there, eat ourself silly of all the authetic chinese food the place got to offer (their southern cuisine is good, but the true treasure are the northern and middle china fares which generally r crappy in MA) and then when we approach food nirvana / coma stage, sleep on our way back, hence a productive Day.

 

Given all the questions and input to date, here is theoverall Guideline your input can follow:

a) the short term day trip group that focus on really cool asian food around flushing (maybe with a side trip to a dessert / pastry shop / festival)

b) the driving folks - just let me know who u r so we can link up contact info

for group A I strongly recommend bus trip together

Currently we are schedule to take the Bolt bus at 630 in the morning and comeback on the 830 bus at night - the bus depart from South Station and lands near Penn Station, we will take the short train ride right across to Flushing

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Food Day Trip to Flushing NY
